Audrey Mbugua (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe gbasara transgender nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgbachitere ọtụtụ ikpe ụlọ ikpe na-agbachitere ikike nke ndị transgender.
Mbugua bụ nwoke na nwanyị transgender amụrụ na Central Kenya
Ọ gara Kiambu High School site n'afọ 1998 ruo 2001
Ọ gụrụ injinia biomedic na Mahadum Maseno site n'afọ 2003 ruo 2007.

Ọ bụ nwanyị hapụrụ ka chi si kee ya mbụ n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka iji gbanwee aha ya n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na akwụkwọ gọọmentị ma debanye aha mbụ na-abụghị uru nke mba ụwa na-eduga na transgender na Afrịka
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Kenya nyere iwu ka gọọmentị Kenya debanye aha ndị Mbugua, Transgender Education and Advocacy, ma kwụọ ụgwọ iwu ya.

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, n'otu ikpe dị ịrịba ama, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Kenya nyere iwu ka Kansụl Nnyocha Mba Kenya gbanwee aha Mbugua na asambodo agụmakwụkwọ ya, nke edepụtara dị ka Andrew, yana iwepu akara nwoke na ha. Kemgbe ọ gbanwere, eziokwu ahụ bụ na asambodo agụmakwụkwọ ya egosighi na okike ya na-egbochi ya ka ọ ghara ịrụ ọrụ.
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Mbugua maka onyinye Tulip nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke Netherlands maka ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2018, e nyere gọọmentị Kenya iwu ka ọ kwụọ Mbugua USD300,000 iji kwụọ ụgwọ iwu ya na mmebi pụrụ iche.
